title: Sans Serif Grotesk ID
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140710062205im_/http:/typophile.com/files/a_willnot_6739.jpg)

I thought this might some cut of Helvetica but the bowl of the e is flatter and the sweep of the t stem is gentler and so too where the ear of the r meets the stem. Then I though it might be Grotesk SS B Book, but I'm wrong again ...grr.

Thanks in advance.
author: 5star

comments.content:
I think this is [Chalet London 1960](http://web.archive.org/web/20140710062205/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/chalet) from House Industries. The a, c and t seem to match, and these seem distinctive.

- Mike Yanega
It is Chalet London NineteenSixty from House-Industries, you beat me Mike.
